response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for us both. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences, is priced at $1,200,000. I believe this offers a fair balance between its intrinsic worth and your valuation, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing how we can make this acquisition a reality for you.", "product_price": 1200000}
